alert.note: Alert for Deaf Smith; Oldham (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 31 at 7:15PM CDT until May 31 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Oldham County in the Panhandle of Texas... Northeastern Deaf Smith County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 715 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Adrian, or 18 miles west of Vega, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. * Locations impacted include... Vega, Adrian and Boys Ranch. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
